column4: Arctic Monkeys are a British indie rock[1] band from Sheffield
column6: Arctic Monkeys currently consists of Alex Turner on lead vocals and guitar
column8: Matt Helders on drums and backing vocals
column9: and Nick O'Malley on bass guitar and backing vocals
column10: a position formerly held by Andy Nicholson.[2] The band's initial popularity came from fan-made demo tapes and online file sharing
column11: and were heralded as one of the first acts to come to the public attention via the Internet.[3] Commentators suggested at the time that they represented the possibility of a change in the way in which new bands are promoted and marketed.[4] The band eventually signed to the independent record label Domino Records.[5]
